ModMetaData.name: Uncomfortable Sleeping Spots
ModMetaData.author: 1Sopel6
ModMetaData.description:
Just because your pawn decided where to lay on the ground doesn't make that ground any more comfortable. This mod sets the Comfort stat of Sleeping Spots (Single, Double, Baby) from 0.4 to 0.
Special thanks to Broms for help with the xml.
